section.name: Third Party Extensions and related libraries
section.p: This page lists third party extensions and projects similar to or derived from ours.

subsection.name: nav:alphanavbar tag library
subsection.p: The Alphabetical Navigation Bar Java Display Tag Library, <nav:alphanavbar: *> , creates an alphabetic navigation bar by slicing and dicing string data stored in a java.util.List object into 36 alphabetically sorted sub list.

subsection.name: Valuelist
subsection.p: Implementation of the Core J2EE Patterns - Value List Handler.
Not based on displaytag, although it seems to inherit something in examples and documentation.
